item.title: Kelly Osbourne Speaks Out After Dad Ozzy’s Death: “I Will Not Be OK for a While”
item.description: The Black Sabbath singer died last month at age 76.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s Family Mourns With Fans as Thousands Flock to Birmingham for Funeral
item.description: Sharon and Kelly Osbourne — who starred alongside Ozzy in the family’s genre-defining reality show — were in tears as they lay flowers at the Black Sabbath Bridge in Birmingham, England.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne, Black Sabbath Frontman and Heavy Metal Legend, Dies at 76
item.description: Ozzy Osbourne, a founding father of British heavy metal, a latter-day solo star and a new-millennium reality TV luminary, died Tuesday after a yearslong struggle with Parkinson’s disease. He was
